# External Data Sources:

*`PS4_GamesSales.csv`
* `Video_Games_Sales_as_at_22_Dec_2016.csv`
* `XboxOne_GameSales.csv`

From https://www.kaggle.com/ashaheedq/video-games-sales-2019:
